ðŸ“– Summary: Feroxbuster is a content discovery tool written in Rust that performs forced browsing to identify unlinked resources on web applications. It uses brute force combined with a wordlist to recursively search for hidden files and directories, helping to uncover sensitive information and potential vulnerabilities.
